message: this is still a parametrized module by spirit, though (in my opinion)

@dreid This is a third attempt to post a comment. Convore keeps clearing my input box. I'll try to be short. As far as I understand, removing parameters from the module declaration is only solving part of the problem. There's still a problem with tuple calls relying on some old technique/hack. I am not very knowledgable on this topic as I am not in this "parameterized haters" camp, but I think people at #erlang can explain this better.

@yrashk I was just trying to create a concise implementation of an inspectable stub implemenation of mochiweb_request.  I'm not terribly concerned with how tuple calls work at this point.  Though sure, parameterized modules are a dirty hack. :)
@yrashk Right, and what really matters is that the SUT doesn't notice any difference.
